participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
I went for a walk today after work, even though I was tired
i got married 10 years later.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.
I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it.

participant_2.background:
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.
our class is planning a trip to japan.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I just went for a walk after work, even though I was tired.
That's awesome! I'm trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
I'm glad to hear that! I love to eat, but I try to be healthy about it. I have two dogs, one pitbull and old english bulldog. Do you have any pets?
I love animals! I have a cat named Mittens.
Awww! I love cats! I do have to say, I'm not a big fan of the skin on apples. My family loves it, but I can't stand it!
That's interesting! I love the skin on apples. I think it adds a lot of flavor.
To each their own, I guess! What are you up to this weekend?
My class is planning a trip to Japan, so I'm going to be spending some time studying up on the culture and history of the country.
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to go to Japan. I'm sure you'll have a great time!
